reviews.review_text: I came into this game not knowing what or how to do, 2 hours later I'm halfway through the season panicking about conditional draft picks and over-seas prospects. I sigh deeply and wonder if I should have just picked a small-market AHL team. Or just quit and get a job for the Oilers to get the 1st overall pick every year.  10/10

The closest you can get to the real thing. If you want to experience hockey at a deep level, this sim is for you. Any deeper, and you will have to manage a real team.  Would happily pay $60 for this game if it had a 3D match engine like the newer Football Managers.
Once you figure out the interface and the mechanics this game is amazing.
464 hours and going. Highly addicting game.
If you guys enjoy hockey and digging into random numbers and stats trying to figure out the best way to win games, this is for you.
Won three Stanley Cups in a row with the Capitals, please let this be a look into the future. :)
Everything you've ever wanted in a sports simulator.
> Pick Vancouver > Win President's Trophy > Vs Boston in final round > Got shut out in game 7  10/10 realism, better luck next year  seriously great game though.
great game!
Finnish last for 3 years in a row. Never win the draft lottery. It is always Edmonton. Always.

-Plays as the Washington Capitals -Wins the Metropolitan Division and is 3rd in the League only behind LA and Chicago  -Sweeps the Pens in Round One -Loses to the Rangers in 7 games 10/10 for realism. No cup for you Ovi
Great game, just got full release. Excited to play
pretty good game
Must have for hockey fans. Also great game if you are a fan of the football manager series!
9/10  Must have for hockey fans.  Still a few tweaks would be great but still recommended.

I love this game. Hockey manager sim? Yes please. I just love taking teams and taking young talent and building teams from the ground up. The people over at Ehm: The blue line have absolutely kept things intersting from EHM 2007, but now with this game, It has opened up a whole new world!

Very pleased with this purchase! To this point (35hrs.) One of the better sports management sims I've played. Very customizable with a prefect for me quick game presentation. 9.25/10 overall (increased rating after 35 hr mark) & 10/10 value.
pretty good game

As a fan of the great sport of hockey, someone whos always played EA's NHL and perfered the GM/Franchise mode every time, I absoultely love this game. As cheesy as it may seem its so fun and intense. There's so much to do even though its such a simulating game, it's hard. Probably one the more realistic ways to feel like your'e involved as a GM of a franchise than anything I've played or seen. 8/10

as a huge hockey and management sim fan i bought this game on release. especially since im also a longtime fan of FM and SI.  so that being said i had high hopes of EHM. Sadly this game does not (yet) deliver the quality one has come to expect from SI.  The game itself has huge potential. but it feels rushed in a whole.  Currently i have 2 MAIN ISSUES with this game.  1) The screen resolution does not support 16:9 only 4:3 for a modern game this is uncceptable as widescreens are the norm. nowadays.  2) very very prone to crashes during the matches. I had to atleast replay each match twice due to crashes of the game. for a game that draws heavily on the FM engine (or so it looks like) this is very unexpected as one should think the engine has already proven his worth in the FM sries.  so currently while this game has huge potential i can not recommend it at this time.

It's an alright game, but literally a few days before the regular season, I have issues trying to read the last message that pops up in my mail. It won't let me read it, so I'd say....it's an alright game, but not recommended.

Game is not nearly as good as the other reviews make it out to be. Sim engine is horribly inaccurate. Player progression is horribly inaccurate. Unless you can be entertained by 2-D circles moving around on a screen, take a pass. It's utterly worthless as a sports sim.
Boring for Casuals
